categories.title: Scheduling
categories.description:
Make scheduling courses and events a breeze with onCourse scheduling. Whether you offer classroom, self-paced or virtual courses, onCourse has the power to manage even the most complex scheduling requirements. Whether you offer classroom, self-paced or virtual courses, onCourse has the power to manage even the most complex scheduling requirements.

Make course scheduling a pleasure and free your organisation from costly mistakes.

  • Collision Detection
  • Course Duplication
  • Availability Rules
  • Capacity Management
  • Worldwide Time-zone Support
  • Automation
  • Timetable Views

features.title: Accounts
features.description: The different transactional accounts available in onCourse.

features.title: Applications
features.description: All the applications sent in by students to courses that are set as 'enrolment by application'.

features.title: Assessment submissions
features.description: A list of the various assessment submissions saved to your onCourse.

features.title: Assessment tasks
features.description: A list of assessment tasks uploaded to your system. They are available to be added to classes.

features.title: Audit Logging
features.description: A recorded log of every action taken in your onCourse system. Also used to power the 'Automation Status' section on the dashboard.

features.title: Automation
features.description: Where to access your reports, export templates, message templates, scripts and more.

features.title: Banking Deposits
features.description: All the banking deposits created in your onCourse system.

features.title: Process payment plans (batch payment in)
features.description: Review and process all outstanding invoices and payment plans. In one batch, charge customer credit cards.

features.title: Certificates
features.description: Manage the certification of students who have achieved competency in their outcomes, including issuing and revoking certificates.

features.title: Change my password
features.description: Change your onCourse password.

features.title: Classes
features.description: A list of all the classes in your onCourse system.

features.title: Community support
features.description: Ask a question of the onCourse community in our forum.

features.title: Companies
features.description: A list of your contacts that are set as being a company.

features.title: Concession types
features.description: The concession types available to your customers in onCourse.

features.title: Contact relation types
features.description: The types of relationships between different contacts in the system. Relationships can be used to link contacts and inherit discounts.

features.title: Contacts
features.description: A complete list of all the contacts in your system, including students, tutors and companies.

features.title: Corporate Pass
features.description: A list of the corporate passes created in your system.

features.title: Courses
features.description: A list of all your courses.

features.title: Custom fields
features.description: Custom fields allow you to create data fields in almost any record type in onCourse to store data that onCourse may not already have a field for.

features.title: Data collection forms
features.description: Organise your data collection questions into different forms covering different processes. Create separate forms for Enrolments, Applications, Surveys, Parents, Payers and more.

features.title: Data collection rules
features.description: Set the rules around which data collection forms are used for which student process. Apply different forms for Enrolments, Applications, Waiting Lists and more.

features.title: Deposit banking
features.description: Create a bank reconcilliation record for today's date.

features.title: Discounts
features.description: Create discounts and apply them to classes to offer savings on enrolment.

features.title: Documentation
features.description: Need to find out how something in onCourse works? Our onCourse documentation manual almost certainly has you covered.

features.title: Documents
features.description: A list of all the documents you've uploaded to your system.

features.title: Enrolments
features.description: A list of all the enrolments you've taken in your system.

features.title: Export AVETMISS 8...
features.description: Export records into the AVETMISS 8 format for the purpose of reporting to govenrment funding agencies.

features.title: Export templates
features.description: Create export templates allowing you to export your onCourse data into a format readable in other applications. Formats include CSV, XML, JSON, PDF and more.

features.title: Finalise period
features.description: Finalise the accounting within the defined start and end dates. Once a period is finalised you cannot edit financial records from before that date again.

features.title: Funding Contract
features.description: Create custom funding contracts for any source of funding that supports the student enrolment, and enable/disable default funding contracts.

features.title: Holidays
features.description: Set the holiday periods your business will be closed for

features.title: Students
features.description: A list of your student contacts.
